Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<<AzureBlade trusted Kali's intentions were not hostile, or at least not 
as much as they could be. He decided to tell her his reasons.

AzureBlade: Very well. I am Protoform Z, the brother of Protoform X, 
whom you might know as Rampage. Unlike my twin, however, I am a 
staunch defender of the Maximal cause, but like him I can feel through 
my spark. I feel emotions, more precisely. And I felt confusion in 
Mistra's spark. I came here to help her out.>>

Protoform Z...Protoform X...Rampage...

None of those names really rang a bell with Mistra....not that she had 
expected them to of course. But she could tell it must be something 
important. He could feel emotions through his spark...

<<He did held back some informations, but he thought Kali would be 
satisfied with this. His expression revealed nothing of this missing 
element. Besides, it was not very important.

AzureBlade: I must also thank you for giving me some precisions on the 
pact. I recognize that you deserve honor. I am eager to fight you on 
the field of battle. You have my word, Predacon. I will tell no one of 
this conversation. Mistra?>>

Mistra nodded "I give you my word as well. No one shall know of our talk." If 
Azure was willing to give his word, she was more than willing to give her own 
as well. 

<<"Are you twin of that... devil????" said Kali "If I hadn't had a 
psichopath as sister I wouldn't belive you... but you aren't 
interested in my troublemaker family... so Maximals kind-heart move 
them act as they act??? It's strange to a predacon, strange and 
dificult to understand.... Just a little question more and after your 
friend say her answer, I'm going to go: what feelings can you feel in 
my spark??? ">>

Devil. Azure was the twin of a devil? Just who was this Rampage anyway? 
Mistra's ears flickered again as she decided now wasn't the time to worry 
about that. Sooner or later, she may find out.

<<AzureBlade closed his eyes. Sensing the general emotion of a spark 
spontaeneously was something, but doing it on purpose was another one. 
It was not impossible, but still difficult.

AzureBlade: I sense you are... curious. You seem to seek a knowledge 
about us, as you stated. You feel defiant in a way. Of course, because 
of this, there was no way you were just going to let us go without at 
least showing yourself. You do not fear us, yet, I sense something 
close to respect... Am I right?>>

Mistra was surprised to see just how specific he seemed to be when it came to 
her emotions. He could tell all of that?

--part1_30.220cc61a.29982506_boundary
